• multiband LCs

multiband_early.engine(self, model_name, …)

engine used to fit multiband lcs independently before peak

multiband_main.engine(self, model_name, …)

engine used to fit multiband lcs independently around the main peak

  • bolometric LCs

bol_early.engine(self, model_name, engine_name)

engine used to fit bolometric lc in the early phases

bol_main.engine(self, model_name, engine_name)

engine used to fit bolometric lc around the main peak

bol_tail.engine(self, model_name, engine_name)

engine used to fit bolometric lc at the tail

bol_full.engine(self, model_name, engine_name)

engine used to fit the full bolometric lc

  • spectrum

specline.engine(self, model_name, engine_name)

engine used to fit spectral lines

specv_evolution.engine(self, model_name, …)

engine used to fit spectral line velocity evolution
